      AudioBuffer JMFActiveMediaPlayer.createAudioBuffer(int seconds) 
      protected static AudioBuffer AudioBuffer.getActiveAudioBuffer()
      Only one AudioBuffer can be "active", because the sound recording hardware cannot be shared between processes.
